item.title: You can now play Doom in a Microsoft Word document, because no app is too sacred - XDA Developers
item.description:
1. You can now play Doom in a Microsoft Word document, because no app is too sacred  XDA Developers

  5. 'Doom' Runs on Bitcoin, Dogecoin and ChatGPT—And Now in PDFs Too  Decrypt
